name: Stradom House, Autograph Collection
description: Stradom House Autograph Collection is housed in an outstanding historical building in Krakow, situated between the Royal castle and the Jewish district. The 125 guestrooms Hotel is a perfect spot to explore the bustling city, surrounded by local attractions, and tailored made experiences. The chic destination is offering a blend of Polish modernism and original historical details. Travellers unwind themselves at Sol SPA, the contemporary Wellness center, including a state-of-the-art Fitness, exclusive wet facilities and an Indoor lap pool. Gourmet traveller's are delighted with an elegant seafood restaurant, John Dory. The guests will experience an upscale eatery, Gaia inspired by the Mediterranean countries cuisine, where the lively atmosphere sets the stage. Hedwig’s Club introduces a world-class bar and a wine cellar in a spectacular converted chapel. This is a Lifestyle venue assembled, transformed and prepared to be a one-of-a-kind experience.Marriott

name: Sheraton Grand Krakow
description: A 5-star experience providing guests with Krakow’s best views. Located at the foot of The Royal Wawel Castle, on the banks of the Wisla River, Sheraton Grand Krakow is steps away from Krakow Cathedral, Main Market Square and Kazimierz district, but also close to the shopping areas and Krakow's conference center. Fully renovated Lobby and Atrium will inspire you and the recently opened Anima Restaurant will deliver extraordinary Italian culinary experience. Sport fans can enjoy live transmissions in our SomePlace Else sports bar. Our famous Roof Top Terrace with amazing views is the best place to enjoy refreshing cocktails. Our 232 airy, fully renovated family guest rooms and suites connect with what you love the most: smart TV with a wide range of channels, in-room dining, High-Speed Internet, and the unique comfort of the Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience bed. Swim laps in our heated indoor pool or workout at our Sheraton Fitness. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes pets for a fee.Marriott

name: Hotel Kossak
description: Hotel Kossak is located in the centre of Kraków in a picturesque area, near Vistula River, just 500 metres from Wawel Castle, offering rooms with free Wi-Fi and air conditioning. The hotel also has a 24-h fitness centre and a sauna. The rooms offer views of the castle and the river. All guestrooms feature a seating area, an LCD TV and a bathroom with a heated mirror. Guests can enjoy the panoramic view of Kraków from the hotel's restaurant. Hotel Kossak offers 24/7 front desk. The hotel’s staff is available for guests who wish to plan a local excursion. The Main Market Square is just a 10-minute walk away from the property.

name: Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco
description: Conveniently situated in Kraków, Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. Speaking English, Italian and Polish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception. Popular points of interest near Hotel Ferreus Modern Art Deco include Lost Souls Alley, St. Mary's Basilica and St. Florian's Gate. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Stary
description: The luxurious Hotel Stary is located in the heart of Kraków’s Old Town. It features a seasonal Sky Bar, located on a rooftop terrace and featuring a view of the Main Market and a picturesque panorama of the Old Town. Guests of the hotel have free access to the on-site spa, which includes a sauna, gym, and a steam bath. In addition, 2 swimming pools with swim jets are available. The air-conditioned rooms and suites at the Stary have bathrooms with a bathtub and shower. Plasma TVs with satellite channels are also available in every room. Some rooms have a balcony. It offers free internet, mineral water and newspapers. It is possible to enjoy a massage or a treatment in the wellness & spa centre, at a surcharge and upon prior request. In the morning guests can enjoy a traditional Polish breakfast. The Trzy Rybki restaurant serves traditional Polish dishes. In addition, the hotel also has a bar, café and a club. Hotel Stary is 1.1 km from the Wawel Castle. The old Jewish district, Kazimierz is 1 km away. Kraków Główny Train Station and Galeria Krakowska shopping centre are also 1 km from the hotel.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Krakow
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 300 guestrooms featuring minibars and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at AC Hotel by Marriott Krakow, you'll be centrally located in Kraków, within a 10-minute drive of Main Market Square and Blonia Park. This 4-star hotel is 9.7 mi (15.7 km) from Wieliczka Salt Mine and 2 mi (3.3 km) from Royal Road. Dining Satisfy your appetite with international cuisine at Sobremesa Restaurant, a fine-dining restaurant which features a bar/lounge and a garden view. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately PLN 70 for adults and PLN 70 for children Airport shuttle fee: PLN 120 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 3) Covered self parking fee: PLN 60 per day Rollaway bed fee: PLN 100.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 12:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash Safety features at this property include a carbon monoxide detector, a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Parking height restrictions apply Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Social distancing measures are in place Property follows a brand or regulatory agency's sanitization guidelines Commitment to Clean (Marriott) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Guest accommodation is sealed after cleaning Contactless food service / room service is available Food service has been amended for enhanced safety Property follows sanitization practices of COVID-19 Guidelines (CDC)Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Art Suites Luxury Hotel
description: Situated in Kraków, 1.5 km from Wawel Royal Castle, Art Suites Luxury Hotel features accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is allergy-free and is set 2 km from National Museum of Krakow. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Art Suites Luxury Hotel the rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Town Hall Tower is 2.5 km from Art Suites Luxury Hotel, while Main Market Square is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Saski Krakow, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: With 200 years of history, our hotel is one block from Old Town’s main plaza and The Cloth Hall. Nearly all Old Town’s restaurants, museums, galleries, and shops are within a 10-minute walk, and Wawel Royal Castle is a 15-minute walk. Take a tram to the Jewish district of Kazimierz. At the end of the day, enjoy a bite and drinks at our on-site restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: Hotel Wawel
description: Hotel Wawel is located in Kraków’s Old Town, between Wawel Castle and the Main Market Square. It features modernly appointed rooms with free Wi-Fi. The Wawel occupies a 16th-century building that has been redesigned in Art Nouveau style. The air-conditioned rooms are fitted with an elegant bathroom and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The Wawel’s friendly staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service. The restaurant serves traditional European dishes, and a wide selection of drinks can be enjoyed in the bar or the hotel's summer garden. In the morning, a varied buffet breakfast is served. Hotel Wawel is located within just a 10-minute walk from the Kazimierz Jewish District. Many lovely cafés, restaurants and clubs can be found just outside the hotel.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Krakow
description: Radisson Blu is a 5-star hotel, located just a 7-minute walk of Kraków’s Main Market Square and the Royal Wawel Castle. It offers spacious and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Free access to sauna and a fitness club is provided. All non-smoking rooms at the Radisson Blu are classically furnished and bright. Each comes with tea and coffee-making facilities and a luxurious bathroom with a bathtub. Some have a seating area. A varied breakfast is served every morning at the Solfez restaurant. Guests can enjoy international and seafood dishes at the Milk&Co restaurant or a wide selection of coffee at Salt&Co bar. For guests travelling with small children the hotel offers bath toys and cosmetics, as well as bathrobes and slippers. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange concierge service. A beauty salon and massage treatments are available. Guests can rent out bicycles for free. Radisson Blu Hotel Kraków is located only 1.5 km from Kraków Główny Railway Station. City’s main attractions are located within just a few-minute walk.

name: Hotel Unicus Palace
description: Boasting a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hotel Unicus Palace is situated in the centre of Kraków, 1.4 km from National Museum of Krakow. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna and a hammam. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Unicus Palace rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or à la carte breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Unicus Palace include Town Hall Tower, Main Market Square and Cloth Hall. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Vienna House Andel's Cracow
description: Vienna House Andel's Cracow is a contemporary 4-star hotel, located just 9 minutes’ walk from the Main Market Square in Kraków. Its designer rooms come with air conditioning and satellite TV. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning at the Mavericks Restaurant, which serves creative, California-style dishes with Asian, Mexican and European influences. In the evening, guests can relax over a drink in the bar Smok. The spacious rooms at Vienna House Andel's Cracow come with a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe box. Some are located on the top floors and feature panoramic views of the beautiful Old Town. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange airport shuttle service and tips on what to do and see in Kraków. Guests can relax in the sauna or work out in the fitness centre. Vienna House Andel's Cracow is situated in the very heart of the city, just off the Main Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska, Kraków’s main shopping centre.

name: Hotel Pod Roza
description: The recently renovated 5-star Hotel Pod Różą is housed in a Renaissance palace in Kraków's Old Town, just off the Main Market Square. It features elegant restaurant and stylish, air-conditioned rooms. Pod Różą is the oldest hotel in Kraków and hosted many famous guests since the 17th century. The rooms at Pod Różą are traditionally decorated and come with a luxurious bathroom with heated floors and Italian fittings. All have free internet and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Wellness & Spa access is included in the room price. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the hotel restaurant, Pod Różą, which specialises in traditional Polish dishes. Hotel Pod Różą is located within a 10-minute walk of the Wawel Royal Castle. Kazimierz, the famous Jewish district, is just one kilometer away.

name: Wyndham Grand Krakow Old Town
description: No description found

name: Hotel Europejski
description: Europejski Hotel is located in the very heart of Kraków, just 10 minutes’ walk from the Main Market Square and 5 minutes' walk from Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre and Kraków Główny Railway Station. It offers classically appointed rooms with free Wi-Fi. The beautifully furnished rooms at the Europejski come with satellite TV and a telephone. All feature a modern bathroom with a hairdryer. Hotel Europejski is distinguished by having its own car park in the city center as well as organizing various events upon request and additional surcharge. The professional staff of the Europejski is available 24 hours a day and will provide guests with any tourist information needed. Kazimierz Jewish District can be reached by tram in just 5 minutes. Wawel Royal Castle is a 15 minute walk away.

name: Hotel Columbus
description: The Columbus Hotel is located in Kraków’s Kazimierz District, just 300 metres away from the Tempel (Temple) Synagogue. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free internet access. The rooms have a modern design, and the furniture is done in exotic wood. Each includes a satellite TV, safety deposit box, minibar and work desk. There is also a bathroom with a hairdryer and a telephone. Free mineral water is provided. Some have balconies. A breakfast buffet is available in the morning. The staff of the Columbus is at your disposal 24/7 and will happily arrange tickets and car/bicycle rental for you. A massage can be enjoyed at a surcharge. The area offers many restaurants and bars. The Planty Park is 750 metres from the hotel. The Kraków Old Town, which features such landmarks as the barbican and The Wawel Royal Castle, is 850 metres away.

name: Ventus Rosa Boutique Aparthotel
description: Ventus Rosa Boutique Aparthotel is situated in the Old Town of Kraków, close to Lost Souls Alley, St. Mary's Basilica and St. Florian's Gate. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchenette, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bath or shower and a hairdryer. A stovetop and toaster are also available, as well as a kettle and a coffee machine. The aparthotel offers a buffet or Full English/Irish breakfast. Wawel Royal Castle is 1 km from Ventus Rosa Boutique Aparthotel, while Cloth Hall is 650 m from the property. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 16 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Due to our exceptional location in the heart of Krakow, the facility has a limited number of parking spaces in front of the hotel (prior reservation is required) and a quarded parking lot 300 meters from the facility.

name: Hotel Rubinstein
description: Hotel Rubinstein is housed in a 15th-century building, located in the heart of the Kazimierz District in Kraków, just off the Old Synagogue. Its rooms and apartments offer air conditioning. All rooms and apartments at the Hotel Rubinstein come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a safe. Many feature impressive wooden ceilings and beams from the 17th and 18th century. A varied buffet breakfast can be enjoyed every morning. It is served at the Rubinstein Restaurant, situated on a glazed patio and specialised in international dishes. After a long day, guest can relax in the Rubinstein’s sauna. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and offers tourist information on what to see and do in Kraków. Rubinstein Hotel is located within just a 10-minute walk of the beautiful Wawel Royal Castle.

name: Hotel Ester
description: The Hotel Ester is located in the heart of Kazimierz, Kraków’s historic Jewish district, within 20 metres of the Old Synagogue. All rooms have private bathrooms and a free Wi-Fi connection. Ester’s air-conditioned rooms all feature flat-screen satellite TVs. Each has a work desk and a refrigerator. A safety deposit box and free mineral water are also provided. In the mornings a breakfast buffet is offered on-site. Later in the day, Ester’s restaurant serves traditional Polish and Jewish dishes. After a meal guests can get a massage or visit the hotel’s sauna. The hotel’s staff is available 24 hours a day. The hotel's tour desk will help guests organise trips to the many places of interest that surround Kraków, such as the Wieliczka Salt Mine. The Wawel Castle and Old Town’s Main Market are within the is 1.3 km from the hotel.

name: Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa
description: The 5-star Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa is located at the Kraków’s Vistula riverbank, just 1.5 km from the Wawel Royal Castle. It features modern spa facilities, spacious rooms and free WiFi, All air-conditioned rooms at the Niebieski are bright and decorated with warm colours. Each has a large LCD TV with satellite channels. Guests can benefit from a minibar and a safe. Free water, tea and coffee are provided. The on-site Vanilla Spa offers a wide selection of spa treatments. Guests can relax in a sauna or work out in the fitness room. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can assist with ticket service to main city’s attractions. A varied buffet breakfast is served at the Vanilla Sky Restaurant, which specialises in Mediterranean and Polish fusion cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at the terrace with a river view. The hotel's pizzeria, Fresco, serves Italian dishes. Niebieski Art Hotel & Spa is situated within a 20-minute walk from the Old Town Kraków. It offers excellent tram and bus connections with all parts of the city.

name: Betmanowska Main Square Residence Adults Only
description: Hotel Betmanowska Main Square Residence is located in the Main Market Square in the Old Town of Kraków and offers a restaurant. Free WiFi access is available. The property is 100 metres from the Cloth Hall. Rooms at Hotel Betmanowska Main Square Residence feature air conditioning and a minibar. Guests are welcomed by a cold bottle of Prosecco. There is a coffee machine and coffee/tea making facilities. Some rooms feature a hydro-massage shower, while some have a spa bath. Each private bathroom also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include a safety deposit box. At Hotel Betmanowska Main Square Residence you will find a bar and a 24-hour front desk. The property is located 50 metres from St Mary’s Basilica. St Florian’s Gate is 400 metres away while Wawel Royal Castle is 1 km away.

name: Bonerowski Palace
address: Rynek Glowny 42/ul. Swietego Jana 1, 31-013 Krakow, Malopolskie
description: Located on Kraków’s Main Market Square in a historic tenement, The Bonerowski Palace offers rooms and luxury apartments. It is located just steps from all the attractions of Kraków’s Main Market Square and 900 metres from Kraków Główny Railway Station. Parking is 500 metres from the property. The spacious rooms and apartments feature a seating area with a work desk. Each comes fitted with a flat-screen TV offering satellite channels. Free mineral water is offered, as is access to wet and dry sauna. In the morning, Bonerowski’s guests can enjoy a hot and cold breakfast buffet. The Amalia Brasserie, set on the ground floor, is known for both modern Polish dishes and French cuisine. There is a summer/winter outdoor garden from which guests can admire the Market Square. In Royal and Ducal Hall there are meeting facilities suitable for wedding receptions, banquets and business meetings. Piano concerts take place in The Bonerowski Palace's historic Royal Hall.

name: The Loft Hotel - Adults Only
description: A stay at The Loft Hotel - Adults Only places you in the heart of Krakow, within a 15-minute walk of Main Market Square and St. Mary's Basilica. This 4-star hotel is 0.5 mi (0.9 km) from Cloth Hall and 0.7 mi (1.1 km) from Krakow Barbican. Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a spa tub and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Enjoy pizza at Incredibile, a theme restaurant which features a bar/lounge, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to noon. Make yourself at home in one of the 28 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring tablet computers and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include safes and minibars, as well as phones with free local calls.FarePortal

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Krakow Hotel & Convention Center
description: DoubleTree by Hilton Krakow, built in 2015, is within walking distance from TAURON Arena Krakow, a multi-purpose hall that hosts concerts, shows and sports competitions. The hotel is located in a green and quiet area of the city with a large 43-hectare park in the immediate vicinity. We are situated near the EXPO Krakow Fair Trade Center and many office parks. The nearest shopping center is 2 km /1.5 mi/ away. The hotel is only a 30-minute drive from Krakow Airport. Enjoy a free Spa experience in our Wellness Zone designed to revitalize and pamper you. Our hotel offers a spacious swimming pool, relaxing whirlpool bath, steam room, herbal sauna and a relaxation area. Our 150 square meter fitness center is fully equipped with a wide range of cardiovascular and strength stations. The fitness center is open 24 hours a day. Each guest room features a flat screen 40-inch TV, complimentary WiFi, spacious work desk, air conditioning, safe and refreshment center. Our hotel has a dedicated Executive Lounge, 24-hour business center and parking for 100 cars. Dine in our 5th Avenue Restaurant where we serve seasonal food that is simple, light and delicious. Unwind each evening in the contemporary Lounge Bar offering a selection of beers, spirits and cocktails.Hilton

name: Farmona Hotel Business & Spa
description: Located in a quiet area of Kraków, Farmona Hotel Business & SPA offers a wide range of spa treatments and a varied breakfast. Elegant rooms come with a balcony and free Wi-Fi. The Farmona’s spa features a sauna. Guests can also relax with a massage by professional Balinese and Thai therapists. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at Farmona Hotel Business & SPA come with an LCD TV with satellite channels. All have a work area with a desk and a laptop safe. Mineral water is offered in the room for free. Farmona’s Magnifica Restaurant has a bar area with a fireplace and serves European dishes. A summer terrace is also available. Farmona offers facilities for children, such as a playground with a swing and a slide, as well as a games room, special plastic cutlery, colouring books and baby proofed wardrobes and sockets. The complex is located in Kraków’s Łagiewniki district, next to a large park, a 20-minute bus ride from the beautiful city centre. Free on-site parking is provided.

name: Novotel Krakow Centrum
description: A place of many possibilities just a few steps from the attractions of Krakow. It offers 198 spacious rooms, most with a view of the Vistula Bend. The offer includes conference rooms, a restaurant, a bar, a children's corner and a recreation centre with swimming pool - all this makes it ideal for a family, business and tourist stay. It is distinguished by an apartment with a terrace where you can admire the panorama of the city with a coffee, or organize an unforgettable celebration in the open air.accorhotels.com

name: Qubus Hotel Krakow
description: Qubus Kraków Hotel is located in a quiet, yet central area of Kraków, next to the Vistula River. It features a swimming pool and a hot tub located on the top floor with impressive views of the city. All air-conditioned rooms at the Qubus are fitted with free WiFi and satellite TV. Each comes with a fridge and a safety deposit box. Most bathrooms have a bathtub. In the morning guests can enjoy an award-winning breakfast buffet. The Qubus Kraków Hotel’s restaurant, specialises in Polish and European cuisine. The hotel breakfast consists of over 100 fresh products, including regional smoked sausages, cheese, salads and hot dishes. Front desk staff speaks excellent English and is available 24 hours a day. Guests can benefit from a fitness centre with a gym, a sauna and a steam bath. Qubus Kraków Hotel is situated in a beautiful area of Podgórze District, within a 5-minute walk from Kazimierz Jewish District. The Main Market Square is just 2 kilometres away.

name: Lwowska 1
description: Situated in Kraków, Lwowska 1 offers a spa centre and sauna. Schindler Factory Museum is 400 metres from the property. Private parking is available on site. The pet-friendly accommodation is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units feature a dining area and/or balcony. A fridge and kettle are also featured. Some units also have a kitchenette, equipped with a stovetop. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. The aparthotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. The property also offers mini-market. There is a 24-hour front desk at Lwowska 1. Galeria Kazimierz is 800 metres from Lwowska 1, while Kazimierz Jewish District is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Krakow - Balice Airport, 11 km from the property.

name: Puro Kraków Kazimierz
description: PURO Kraków Kazimierz is set in vibrant district of Kraków and provides a fitness centre and a terrace. You can rent a bike free of charge (when weather conditions are good). Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge, a bar and on-site dining. Galeria Kazimierz is 300 metres away. At PURO Kraków Kazimierz, each room includes a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, all guest rooms at PURO Kraków Kazimierz have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a seating area. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at PURO Kraków Kazimierz can enjoy a breakfast, MAK bread & coffee place, Halicka restaurant and Prisma SPA. PURO Kraków Kazimierz offers a sauna*, 2 external terraces and garden. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English and Polish. Schindler Factory Museum is 900 metres from PURO Kraków Kazimierz, while Wawel Royal Castle is 1.1 km from the property. Krakow - Balice Airport is 11 km away. * Sauna is open for guests from Monday till Thursday between hours 4pm-10pm (from 7 am at the request of the guest, from Friday till Sunday sauna is open between 7am-10pm).

name: Hotel Unicus Krakow Old Town
description: Hotel Unicus Krakow Old Town is a modern boutique property located in Kraków’s Old Town, just 210 metres from the Main Market Square. All air-conditioned rooms are beautifully designed and strictly non-smoking. Free WiFi is available. The rooms at the Unicus feature docking stations for iPod and iPhone and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Guests can benefit from tea and coffee making facilities and a minibar. Guests can visit the Unicus’s top-class restaurant, offering delicious dishes by an award-winning chef. In the morning a varied buffet breakfast is served. The helpful reception staff is at guests’ disposal 24 hours a day and speaks excellent English. Car rental service and ticket service are available. Unicus Hotel also offers a sauna where guests can relax after a long day and a small gym. The Wawel Royal Castle is situated within a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Famous Kazimierz Jewish District with many cafés and restaurants is just 1.5 km away.

name: Hotel Apis
description: Hotel Apis is located in Kraków, 2 km from the city centre and just by E7 exit to Warsaw. There is free Wi-Fi in all areas. The Apis's spacious and air-conditioned rooms feature a classic design, an LCD TV, carpeted floors and wooden furniture. All include a work desk and a renovated private bathroom with a shower. Free bottled water is provided. The hotel’s staff is available 24-hours a day. Guests can visit the recreational centre, relax in the sauna or enjoy a steam bath at a surcharge. The Apis’s restaurant, Mozaika Resto Bar, serves Polish and international dishes, based on natural ingredients provided by local producers. Vegetarian and gluten-free diet options are available. There is also a cafe on site. A bus stop is close to the Apis and offers transportation to Kraków’s Old Town, which is 3.6 km away. The E77 expressway is just by the hotel and national road 79 is within 650 metres. Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska Shopping Centre are both within 3 km of the Apis. There is an aqua park 2 km from the hotel and Business Quattro Park can be found within 500 metres. The distance to Kazimierz is 5 km.

name: Hotel H15 Luxury Palace
description: Set in Kraków and with St. Florian's Gate reachable within 100 metres, Hotel H15 Luxury Palace offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a fitness centre, as well as an indoor pool and a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel H15 Luxury Palace all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near Hotel H15 Luxury Palace include Krakow Central Railway Station, Lost Souls Alley and St. Mary's Basilica. The nearest airport is John Paul II International Kraków–Balice, 17 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bachleda Luxury Hotel Krakow - MGallery
description: Housed in a historic building, Bachleda Luxury Hotel is an exclusive space where classical meets a touch of Krakow's Art Deco. This 5-star hotel is located in the heart of Krakow. Refined Interiors let you feel chic and elegance in an urban environment. G uests can relax in the Wellness area with swimming pool and saunas, unwind in the Opus Lounge bar or enjoy culinary journey in the GAVI restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Queen Boutique Hotel
description: The elegant, 4-star Queen Boutique Hotel is located between Kraków’s Old Town and Kazimierz district, 700 metres from the Wawel Castle. It features stylish rooms with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Sauna access is free of charge. All rooms at the Queen Boutique are air-conditioned and come with tea making set. They are decorated with modern details and contrasting bright and dark colours. Each room is soundproofed and come with a safe, minibar and a seating area. Some have stunning city views. A varied buffet breakfast is served in the air-conditioned restaurant, the Amarylis. This 3-room restaurant specialises in Polish and fusion dishes. Guests can try a selection of treatments in the on-site beauty and spa facilities. Friendly front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle service and provide tourist information. Thanks to its central location, there are many landmarks near the Queen Boutique Hotel. The Main Market Square is 1 km away. The Tempel Synagogue and the Planty Park are both within 450 metres.

name: Hotel Sympozjum & Spa
description: With elegant interiors and marble floors, Hotel Sympozjum & SPA offers a range of dining and relaxation facilities, just 3 kilometres from Krakow's Old Town. All rooms at the Sympozjum come with a TV, radio and bathroom with hair-dryer and a shower. Free internet is provided. Each modern bathroom has a hair-dryer and a shower. The hotel’s restaurant, Rozmaryn, serves fine European cuisine and a wide selection of wines, while the café-bar is a great place to relax with a drink. The spa facilities of Hotel Sympozjum include saunas and massage rooms. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and will gladly assist with arranging laundry or ticket services. Hotel Sympozjum & SPA allows easy access to Krakow's tourist attractions. The beautiful Main Market Square with famous Cloth Hall is only 4 km away.

name: Hotel Yarden by Artery Hotels
description: Yarden Aparthotel by Artery Hotels offers elegant rooms in a central location, only an 8-minute walk from Kraków Barbican and a 14-minute walk from the Main Square. Guests can use Wi-Fi in all areas free of charge. All rooms are tastefully decorated and classically furnished. They all feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a telephone, a desk and night tables. Each bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Rooms overlook the city or the garden. It is possible to arrange baby equipment. Guests are welcome to enjoy complimentary tea, coffee and mineral water provided in each room. Breakfast buffet is served daily. Packed lunches and special diet menus can also be arranged upon request. The garden at Yarden Aparthotel by Artery Hotels is an ideal place for a picnic. It is possible to rent a bicycle or a car on site. Massages and a variety of tours can be arranged upon request. The property is located only 2 km from the Wawel Castle. The Main Railway Station is just 1 km away.

name: Grand Hotel
description: This luxurious 5-star hotel located just 100 metres from Kraków’s beautiful Main Market Square. It features elegant rooms with period furnishings, full HD LED TVs, air conditioning and free wireless internet. The hotel houses Grand Signature Restaurant which specialises in traditional Polish and European cuisine. Guests can enjoy original freshly baked cakes with aromatic coffee in the Grand Café All rooms at the Grand feature classical design. Each comes with a fully equipped bathroom with a bathtub and a safety deposit box. Free bottle of mineral water and a sweet welcome treat are offered. Grand Hotel has been awarded by the Michelin Red Guide as one of the best three hotels in Kraków. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange shuttle or dry cleaning services. Kazimierz, the famous Jewish district, is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Aparthotel Stare Miasto
description: Centrally located, Aparthotel Stare Miasto offers easy access to Krakow's popular shopping and sightseeing areas. It features panoramic city views and 4-star apartments. This modern property offers luggage storage, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. Aparthotel Stare Miasto offers 18 air conditioned apartments. A refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe are also included. Aparthotel Stare Miasto provides a conveniently located on-site café. Alternatively, there are a variety of other eating options in close proximity. Located in Krakow City Centre, Aparthotel Stare Miasto is surrounded by well-known bars and establishments. Situated within a short stroll are Main Market Square and the Historical Museum of Krakow.Revato

name: Inx Design Hotel
description: Situated in Kraków, 1.5 km from Schindler Factory Museum, INX Design Hotel has a fitness centre and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The accommodation features a business centre and free WiFi. At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. INX Design Hotel offers certain units that include a terrace, and all rooms are equipped with a kettle. Guest rooms feature a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is served each morning at the property. There is an on-site restaurant, which specialises in Polish, Thai and American cuisine and also offers vegetarian and gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near INX Design Hotel include Wawel Royal Castle, St. Mary's Basilica and Lost Souls Alley. John Paul II International Kraków–Balice Airport is 24 km from the property.

name: Hotel Copernicus
description: The 5-star Hotel Copernicus is housed in a Renaissance building in Kraków’s Old Town. It features beautiful, historic interiors with a sauna and swimming pool housed in the vaulted cellars. The rooms at the Copernicus are spacious and feature wooden ceilings and 14th-century decorations. All come with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a luxurious, marble bathroom. Free mineral water and newspapers are offered. The air-conditioned Copernicus has a terrace with panoramic views of the Wawel. Guests can also visit the hotel restaurant, which serves seasonal Polish cuisine and is recommended by the Michelin Guide. Front desk staff is available 24 hours a day and can arrange for dry cleaning and laundry services. Guests can try a selection of massage treatments in the on-site spa facilities. Hotel Copernicus is located just a 3-minute walk from the Wawel Royal Castle. The Main Market Square is a 7-minute walk, while Kazimierz Jewish District is only a 10-minute walk away.

name: Great Polonia Kraków Old Town
description: Great Polonia Kraków Old Town is situated in Kraków’s Old Town, 150 metres from the Main Market. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat screen TV in the completely renovated 16th century building. Thanks to its location, Kraków’s most popular landmarks, shops and restaurant are within 200 metres. This includes the Cloth Hall, St. Mary’s Basilica and Floriańska Street. Kraków Główny Railway Station and Galeria Krakowska are both 700 metres from the hotel. The Wawel Castle is 1.2 km from the Great Polonia Kraków Old Town. The hotel serves a continental breakfast buffet. The property has an associated car parking 150m away, advance booking is required, additional charges may apply.

name: Home Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Kraków, Home Aparthotel is a design property, the interiors of which are inspired by religious imagery. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and an LCD satellite TV. The rooms of the Home Aparthotel feature a unique design with various religious symbols. Each one has an electric kettle and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The public spaces of the property are done in black and red, with gothic decorative elements. Guests can relax in the sauna or work out in the fitness centre. Restaurant in the cellar offers a breakfast buffet in the mornings. Kraków’s Kazimierz district is within 300 metres, and the Wawel Castle is 750 metres from the property. The Old Town’s Main Market is 900 metres from Home Aparthotel.

name: Hotel City Sm Business & Spa
description: Hotel City SM Business & SPA is located just 4 km from the Krakow city centre. It features an indoor pool and a wellness centre. The spa and wellness centre includes also a sauna, a steam room, a fitness room and a new Neogi Flamingo anti-ageing capsule. Guests are offered discounts in the wellness centre. Prior reservation is necessary and pool and wellness facilities are available at extra charge. This hotel offers you single, double and triple rooms with private bathrooms and free internet access. City SM Hotel also features a restaurant serving regional and international cuisine, and a café-bar with a lovely terrace in the garden. The surrounding area offers a convenient access to several main roads. Nearby attractions include the Sanctuary of Divine Mercy in the district of Lagiewniki, and just 500 metres away guests will find Zakopianka Shopping Centre.
